fixes.name: dep calc 1
fixes.solution_explanation: The Tableau expression [DeptID] is a row-level field reference. In DAX this maps directly to the column reference 'HR Dataset'[DeptID], implemented as a calculated column because it operates at the row level.

fixes.name: BATCH
fixes.solution_explanation: The Tableau expression BATCH is a row-level field reference. Translated to DAX as the column reference 'HR Dataset'[BATCH]. This is a calculated column because it references a single row-level field without aggregation or parameters.
